name: Blunderbuss (KralikoGames, kreksyte, MrGeko, Flamebeard10339, RileyCircles)
description:
BLUNDERBUSS!

Featuring!

  • A very sleepless night
  • An opening comic
  • 11 different projectiles to fire from your favorite blunderbuss
  • A cute villainous crow
  • A bopping music track
  • And a jogging corn monster

Known Bugs/Tips:

  • YOU CAN CLICK THROUGH THE COMIC TO RESTART FASTER
  • Respawning gets you a different loadout! (Might be a good idea if you get...a prickly bullet)
  • Audio glitches into respawning at the comic
  • Dead hedgehogs can follow you (aesthetic choice? >.>)
  • Gates can open early
  • Enemies can be trapped, escape their rooms, and something in between
  • Invincible enemies but they can't hit you either (well that's a relief)
  • When you get to the end of the game, that's it no game over screen
